segments.text: I really need to start eating healthier .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have to start eating better too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of food do you usually eat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I try my best to eat only fruits , vegetables , and chicken .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is that really all that you eat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do you stick to only those foods ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , fruits and veggies are really good for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I know , but what about the chicken ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I mainly eat baked chicken , because there's not a lot of fat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know it does , and that's because it is .
segments.speaker: S2
